EmailTemplate.name: Lodgement Migration Parcel Send Non-CSSO
EmailTemplate.subject: We’re inviting you to use Parcel Send
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We’re inviting you to use Parcel Send
A business of Australia Post
We’re inviting you to use Parcel Send
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Welcome to Parcel Send.
To set up your account, register now and follow the prompts. You’ll be up and running in minutes.
Register now
Still have questions?
If you’ve got any questions, please email our friendly support team at lodgementmigration@auspost.com.au.
Kind regards,
The Australia Post team
This email was sent by Australia Post. Australia Post does not represent, warrant or guarantee that the integrity of this email communication has been maintained nor that the communication is free of errors, viruses or interference.
Terms & conditions | Privacy policy
